tk.michaelmckey.microcontrollerremote.recyclerview

Class RecyclerAdapter<E extends RecyclerElement>

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<RecyclerViewHolder<E>>
      • tk.michaelmckey.microcontrollerremote.recyclerview.RecyclerAdapter<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of the object to display in the RecyclerView

    class RecyclerAdapter<E extends RecyclerElement>
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<RecyclerViewHolder<E>>
    Provides binding of RecyclerElement objects to RecyclerViewHolders. Also manages sorting and filtering of data set.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael McKey

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter

    • Method Detail

      • setSortBy

        public void setSortBy(@NonNull
                      SortBy sortBy)
        Changes how the RecyclerView is sorted
        Parameters:
        sortBy - the characteristic to sort the elements by

      • setOrder

        public void setOrder(@NonNull
                     Order order)
        Changes how the RecyclerView is sorted
        Parameters:
        order - the order that the elements should be displayed(ascending or descending order)

      • compareElements

        private int compareElements(@NonNull
                            E object1,
                            @NonNull
                            E object2)
        Compares two elements to find out how they should be sorted. Returns pSorts the list using the value of mSortBy and mOrder
        Parameters:
        object1 - an element to compare to the second
        object2 - an element to compare to the first
        Returns:

        less than zero - if the first object should appear before the second,

        zero - if the objects determining characteristics match

        greater than zero - if the first object should appear after the second

      • filter

        private void filter()
        Filters and sorts the RecyclerView(using the query, the sort by and the order). Uses the compareElements(E, E) function

      • filter

        public void filter(@NonNull
                   java.lang.String query)
        Filters and sorts the RecyclerView(using the query, the sort by and the order). Uses the compareElements(E, E) function
        Parameters:
        query - the new query to filter the list by
